result.eng: Turn right at the second crossroads.
result.ga: Cas ar dheis ag an dara crosaire
result.orig: Cas ar dheis ag an dara crosaire
result.html: Cas ar dheis ag an dara crosaireTurn right at the second crossroads.
result.ponchtml: Cas ar ḋeis ag an dara crosaireTurn right at the second crossroads.

result.eng: We are on the second floor.
result.ga: Tá muid ar an dara hurlár
result.orig: Tá muid ar an dara hurlár
result.html: Tá muid ar an dara hurlárWe are on the second floor.
result.ponchtml: Tá muid ar an dara hurlárWe are on the second floor.

result.ga: Is é seo mo mhac Dara
result.orig: Is é seo mo mhac Dara
result.html: Is é seo mo mhac DaraThis is my son Dara.
result.ponchtml: Is é seo mo ṁac DaraThis is my son Dara.

result.eng: Dara has a brother but he is at the primary school now.
result.ga: Tá deartháir ag Dara ach tá sé sa mbunscoil anois
result.orig: Tá deartháir ag Dara ach tá sé sa mbunscoil anois
result.html: Tá deartháir ag Dara ach tá sé sa mbunscoil anoisDara has a brother but he is at the primary school now.
result.ponchtml: Tá dearṫáir ag Dara aċ tá sé sa mbunscoil anoisDara has a brother but he is at the primary school now.

result.eng: I saw her here a couple of times with your son Dara.
result.ga: Chonaic mé í anseo cúpla uair le do mhac Dara
result.orig: Chonaic mé í anseo cúpla uair le do mhac Dara
result.html: Chonaic mé í anseo cúpla uair le do mhac DaraI saw her here a couple of times with your son Dara.
result.ponchtml: Ċonaic mé í anseo cúpla uair le do ṁac DaraI saw her here a couple of times with your son Dara.

result.eng: The second door on the left.
result.html: An dara doras ar chléThe second door on the left.
result.ponchtml: An dara doras ar ċléThe second door on the left.

result.eng: One week was nice and warm, but the second week was a little cold.
result.ga: Bhí seachtain amháin deas te ach bhí an dara seachtain beagáinín fuar
result.orig: Bhí seachtain amháin deas te ach bhí an dara seachtain beagáinín fuar
result.html: Bhí seachtain amháin deas te ach bhí an dara seachtain beagáinín fuarOne week was nice and warm, but the second week was a little cold.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí seaċtain aṁáin deas te aċ ḃí an dara seaċtain beagáinín fuarOne week was nice and warm, but the second week was a little cold.

result.ga: Is mise an dara duine is óige
result.orig: Is mise an dara duine is óige
result.html: Is mise an dara duine is óigeI am the second youngest.
result.ponchtml: Is mise an dara duine is óigeI am the second youngest.

result.eng: I'm living in a small town in County Kildare these days.
result.ga: Tá mé i mo chónaí i mbaile beag i gContae Chill Dara na laethanta seo
result.orig: Tá mé i mo chónaí i mbaile beag i gContae Chill Dara na laethanta seo
result.html: Tá mé i mo chónaí i mbaile beag i gContae Chill Dara na laethanta seoI'm living in a small town in County Kildare these days.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé i mo ċónaí i mbaile beag i gContae Ċill Dara na laeṫanta seoI'm living in a small town in County Kildare these days.

result.eng: Eimear is seven years (old) and Dara is ten years (old).
result.ga: Tá Eimear seacht mbliana agus tá Dara deich mbliana
result.orig: Tá Eimear seacht mbliana agus tá Dara deich mbliana
result.html: Tá Eimear seacht mbliana agus tá Dara deich mblianaEimear is seven years (old) and Dara is ten years (old).
result.ponchtml: Tá Eimear seaċt mbliana agus tá Dara deiċ mblianaEimear is seven years (old) and Dara is ten years (old).

result.eng: Two minutes past nine, a second building in the Trade Center exploded.
result.ga: Dhá nóiméad tar éis a naoi phléasc dara foirgneamh an Lárionad Trádála
result.orig: Dhá nóiméad tar éis a naoi phléasc dara foirgneamh an Lárionad Trádála
result.html: Dhá nóiméad tar éis a naoi phléasc dara foirgneamh an Lárionad TrádálaTwo minutes past nine, a second building in the Trade Center exploded.
result.ponchtml: Ḋá nóiméad tar éis a naoi ṗléasc dara foirgneaṁ an Lárionad TrádálaTwo minutes past nine, a second building in the Trade Center exploded.

result.eng: The second attack changed the country instantly.
result.ga: D'athraigh an dara ionsaí an tír láithreach
result.orig: D'athraigh an dara ionsaí an tír láithreach
result.html: D'athraigh an dara ionsaí an tír láithreachThe second attack changed the country instantly.
result.ponchtml: D'aṫraiġ an dara ionsaí an tír láiṫreaċThe second attack changed the country instantly.
